EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2016.Invite - Reactive Spring Framework 5.0 - 5-
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform 2016 - Reactive Spring Framework 5.0 is Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> Reactive Spring Framework 5.0 is Pivotal
The Spring Team at Pivotal is excited to introduce Spring Framework’s reactive web stack with a familiar annotated MVC style programming model <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/02/09/reactive-spring]]>. Join leading committers from Spring, Cloud Foundry, RabbitMQ, Redis, Apache Software Foundation together with industry leaders from Pivotal, Netflix, Google, Kroger, and more. Network with top industry developers, operators, architects, product managers, data scientists, and executives as we gather for in-depth conversations on the impact of transformative software at SpringOne Platform 2016. The ticket price increases again June 11, so register now <[[http://info.pivotal.io/HI002000A0m06J00NhU00DC]]>, and remember to book the hotel! <[[http://springoneplatform.io/travel]]>
Pre-conference training July 31—Aug 1st: Spring Cloud Data Flow class added
Expert instructors from Pivotal Education offers a series of accelerated, hands-on training workshops prior to the SpringOne Platform conference. Training ticket prices increase on June 11, so register now for these in-depth trainings on the latest Pivotal and Spring technologies and save. Check out the new Spring Cloud Data Flow training!
Developing Applications with Cloud Foundry <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#developing-applications-with-cloud-foundry]]> Building the Connected Car <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#building-the-connected-car]]> Spring Cloud Services <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-cloud-services]]> Spring Boot Primer <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-boot-primer]]> Spring Cloud Data Flow <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-cloud-data-flow]]>
Aria Resort and Casino <[[https://www.aria.com/]]> 3730 S Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV 89158, United States [map <[[https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/ARIA+Resort+%26+Casino+Las+Vegas/@36.106659,-115.176909,16z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x80c8c42e1d156485:0x2ef3882f44b3056f?hl=en]]>] (702) 590-7111 <[[tel:17025907111]]>
Join the conversation at SpringOne Platform 2016!
Register Today! <[[http://info.pivotal.io/HI002000A0m06J00NhU00DC]]>
We hope to see you there,
The Pivotal <[[pivotal.io]]> team
